name: Bev's Mac and Cheese
author: Andrew
summary: This is a quick and delicious version of an American classic made with sharp Cheddar. Add diced ham or tomatoes, or top with more cheese and broil for a crispy Cheddar crust.
directions: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil
Add pasta and cook for 8 to 10 minutes or until al dente; drain and reserve
In a microwave-safe bowl, combine milk, flour and salt and pepper to taste; whisk or beat until smooth
Add butter and cheese; microwave on high for 5 minutes and whisk until smooth
Microwave for an additional 4 to 5 minutes and whisk or beat until smooth and no lumps remain
Add cooked pasta to mixture; stir and serve
